comments.body: We should have two space for selectors. Also, would be nice if they line up. :smile:

> Also, would be nice if they line up.

Not a big fan of aligning comments. Too much hassle and lead to things like [this](https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/pull/239/files#r58036140).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +24,28 @@        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libjson-c.a  # [unix]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libjson-c.so  # [linux]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libjson-c.dylib  # [osx]
        - conda inspect linkages -n _test json-c  # [linux]

comments.body: Hmm...didn't we have some issues with this before?
Only with latest conda-build. Since that does not work on Windows and I am avoiding OS X we are good. (conda-build is pinned to an old version in the CircleCI due to another conda-bug.)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +25,29 @@        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libjson-c.so  # [linux]
        - test -f ${PREFIX}/lib/libjson-c.dylib  # [osx]
        - conda inspect linkages -n _test json-c  # [linux]
